original_text:
But now, all you who light fires
    and provide yourselves with flaming torches,
go, walk in the light of your fires
    and of the torches you have set ablaze.
This is what you shall receive from my hand:
    You will lie down in torment.
korean_text: 보라 불을 피우고 횃불을 둘러 띤 자여 너희가 다 너희의 불꽃 가운데로 걸어가며 너희가 피운 횃불 가운데로 걸어갈지어다 너희가 내 손에서 얻을 것이 이것이라 너희가 고통이 있는 곳에 누우리라

sentences.original_text: But now, all you who light fires
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제, 너희 불을 피우는 자들아

sentences.original_text: and provide yourselves with flaming torches,
go, walk in the light of your fires
and of the torches you have set ablaze.
This is what you shall receive from my hand:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희가 내 손에서 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: You will lie down in torment.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 고통 가운데 눕게 될 것이다
